		{other provider identifier_44} as string,
		{other provider identifier type code_44} as string,
		{other provider identifier state_44} as string,
		{other provider identifier issuer_44} as string,
		{other provider identifier_45} as string,
		{other provider identifier type code_45} as string,
		{other provider identifier state_45} as string,
		{other provider identifier issuer_45} as string,
		{other provider identifier_46} as string,
		{other provider identifier type code_46} as string,
		{other provider identifier state_46} as string,
		{other provider identifier issuer_46} as string,
		{other provider identifier_47} as string,
		{other provider identifier type code_47} as string,
		{other provider identifier state_47} as string,
		{other provider identifier issuer_47} as string,
		{other provider identifier_48} as string,
		{other provider identifier type code_48} as string,
		{other provider identifier state_48} as string,
		{other provider identifier issuer_48} as string,
		{other provider identifier_49} as string,
		{other provider identifier type code_49} as string,
		{other provider identifier state_49} as string,
		{other provider identifier issuer_49} as string,
		{other provider identifier_50} as string,
		{other provider identifier type code_50} as string,
		{other provider identifier state_50} as string,
		{other provider identifier issuer_50} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProviderOtherIdentifiers
ProviderTaxonomyMonth derive(current_flag = '1') ~> AddCurrentFlag
AddCurrentFlag unpivot(output(
		name as string,
		value as string
	),
	ungroupBy(current_flag,
		data_month,
		npi,
		{entity type code},
		{entity type},
		{active flag}),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: true) ~> Normalized
Filter1 derive(name_standard = left(name,instr(name,'_')-1),
		position = right(name,(length(name)-instr(name,'_')))) ~> RefineFieldNamePos
RefineFieldNamePos pivot(groupBy(current_flag,
		data_month,
		npi,
		{entity type code},
		{entity type},
		{active flag},
		position),
	pivotBy(name_standard),
	{} = first(value),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
ProviderOtherIdentifiers derive(current_flag = '1') ~> AddCurrentFlagProvOtherID
AddCurrentFlagProvOtherID unpivot(output(
		name as string,
		value as string
	),
	ungroupBy(current_flag,
		data_month,
		npi,
		{entity type code},
		{entity type},
		{active flag}),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: true) ~> NormalizedProvOtherID
Filter2 derive(name_standard = left(name,instr(name,'_')-1),
		position = right(name,(length(name)-instr(name,'_')))) ~> RefineFieldNamePosProvOtherID
RefineFieldNamePosProvOtherID pivot(groupBy(current_flag,
		data_month,
		npi,
		{entity type code},
		{entity type},
		{active flag},
		position),
	pivotBy(name_standard),
	{} = first(value),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot2
Pivot2 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name!='position'))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Normalized filter(!(isNull(value) || value == '')) ~> Filter1
NormalizedProvOtherID filter(!(isNull(value) || value == '')) ~> Filter2
Pivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		current_flag as string,
		data_month as integer,
		npi as string,
		{entity type code} as string,
		{entity type} as string,
		{active flag} as string,
		position as string,
		{healthcare provider primary taxonomy switch} as string,
		{healthcare provider taxonomy code} as string,
		{healthcare provider taxonomy group} as string,
		{provider license number} as string,
		{provider license number state code} as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		current_flag as string,
		data_month as integer,
		npi as string,
		{entity type code} as string,
		{entity type} as string,
		{active flag} as string,
		{other provider identifier} as string,
		{other provider identifier issuer} as string,
		{other provider identifier state} as string,
		{other provider identifier type code} as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
